name: NSTextAlternatives
desc: A list of alternative strings for a piece of text.

items.name: var primaryString: String
items.desc: The text that was initially chosen as the input string.

items.name: var alternativeStrings: [String]
items.desc: An array of alternative possible interpretations that the user might select.

items.name: func noteSelectedAlternativeString(String)
items.desc: Sent to the NSTextAlternatives object by the text view when the user chooses one of the alternative strings.

items.name: class let selectedAlternativeStringNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted when the user selects an alternate string.
